description: This task depends on the task "Update The Mifos Initiative Wikipedia Page" and involves translating the Mifos Initiative Wikipedia page https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mifos_Initiative Into French. Note that any student who makes significant project to close this task shall have great rewards as this task has a high coefficient. Share the document you've written with the task mentor in https://goo.gl/vJjxaP and append your name to the submitted file so that we know who did the work.
name: Translate The Mifos Initiative Wikipedia Page Into French ( Francais )
